title: Update envelope overlay to include centered heart icon between greeting and date

requirements.summary: Replace the Screen 1 envelope overlay /* Content */ block with the provided centered layout and inserted circular gradient heart icon between the heading and date.
acceptanceCriteria: The envelope overlay content container uses `className="absolute inset-0 flex flex-col items-center justify-center text-center p-6 space-y-3 z-10"`.
The overlay shows three vertically-stacked elements in this order: "Hey Love" heading, circular gradient heart icon, and "14.02.2026" date.

The inserted heart icon block uses the exact classes `w-16 h-16 bg-gradient-to-br from-rose-500 to-rose-600 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center shadow-xl motion-safe:animate-pulse-glow` and renders a `Heart` icon with `size={30}` and `fill="currentColor"`.
The envelope's existing heart seal remains present and visually on top (its current `z-20` behavior is unchanged).

file_operations.description: In the Screen 1 envelope overlay block marked `/* Content */`, update the container classes to include `text-center`, `space-y-3`, and `z-10` (matching the exact className from the requirement), remove `mb-2` from the "Hey Love" heading, and insert a centered circular gradient heart icon block between the heading and the "14.02.2026" date using `<Heart className="text-white" size={30} fill="currentColor" />`. Ensure the existing heart seal element (with `z-20`) is left unchanged so it remains visually on top.
